settings.text:
We believe in the power of science and nature. While our key ingredients stem from the nutrient-rich bounty of the Caribbean, we ensure a harmonious blend of natural extracts with modern active ingredients to offer balanced yet efficacious remedies.

Mindfully Clean. Vegan. Gluten-Free. Cruelty-Free

settings.Title: papaya ferment extract
settings.Content: Rich in essential enzymes, vitamins, and minerals, papaya extract acts as a gentle but effective exfoliant to the skin to help reveal a brighter and healthier complexion.

settings.Title: Guajava Leaf Extract
settings.Content: Rich in powerful antioxidants and one of the richest sources of Vitamin C, Guava also helps to defend against free radical damage to promote healthy skin.

settings.Title: Turmeric root oil
settings.Content: Contains curcumin which is a powerful source of antioxidants and acts as an anti-inflammatory to help relieve and calm stressed skin.

settings.Title: castor oil
settings.Content: Rich in fatty-acids and vitamins, castor oil is a powerful hydrator that delivers moisture to the skin to retain suppleness.

settings.Title: Squalene
settings.Content: Squalene (100% plant based from Olives) is the ultimate hydrator that delivers both antioxidant and moisturizing benefits to support a healthy, supple, skin.

settings.Title: Neem Seed Oil
settings.Content: Need Seem Oil helps to combat redness and inflammation through its natural antiseptic properties and fatty acids.

settings.Title: SOURSOP EXTRACT
settings.Content: Contains a large amount of vitamin C and antioxidants which helps promote healthy and glowing skin.

settings.Title: PASSIONFRUIT EXTRACT
settings.Content: This plant extract has beneficial antioxidants that helps soothe skin and protect from free radical damage.

settings.Title: SHEA BUTTER
settings.Content: Packed with fatty acids, shea butter's emollient properties help to soften and hydrate skin.

settings.Title: Banana Fruit Extract
settings.Content: An antioxidant that protects the skin from free radical damage. It is also hydrating, mildly exfoliates, and is anti-inflammatory.

settings.Title: Wild Yam Root Extract
settings.Content: A natural emollient that moisturizes and can help with collagen production. It is also rich in antioxidants, which protects the skin from free radical damage.

settings.Title: Lavender Flower Water
settings.Content: Cherished for centuries, lavender flower water provides hydration and helps to soothe the skin while reducing the appearance of imperfections for a smooth, glowing complexion.

settings.Title: Lychee Seed powder
settings.Content: A natural exfoliant rich in antioxidants, helping to gently remove dead skin cells while protecting against free radical damage. It promotes a smoother, brighter complexion and supports skin hydration with its natural polyphenols.

settings.Title: Hibiscus Flower Extract
settings.Content: Contains antioxidants, natural acids, and peptides, helping to promote skin elasticity, brighten the complexion, and provide gentle exfoliation. It also supports hydration and collagen production, making it a powerful anti-aging ingredient.

settings.Title: Jamaican blue mountain coffee
settings.Content: Rich in antioxidants and caffeine, helping to protect the skin from free radicals, reduce puffiness, and boost circulation for a more radiant complexion. Its gentle exfoliating properties also help remove dead skin cells, promoting smoother and brighter skin.

settings.Title: SOURSOP EXTRACT
settings.Content: Contains a large amount of vitamin C and antioxidants which helps promote healthy and glowing skin.

settings.Content: This plant extract has beneficial antioxidants that helps soothe skin and protect from free radical damage.
